summary: Vimbuddy (update): An absolutely unuseful little thing
name: vimbuddy.vim--Whiteinge
description:
An update to vimscript #8 for Vim 7 by the Gentoo guys.

I'm neither the author nor the updator (if you are, drop me a line and I'll relinquish control of this page).

Puts a smiley on your status line. Nose will rotate on <Left> and <Right>
Will frown on errors and warnings
install_details: Source vimbuddy.vim from your .vimrc or put into ~/.vim/plugin/ then put the string "%{VimBuddy()}" into your 'statusline'
